website_summaries.verdict: Multi-use footrest also serves as storage solution, stool and more.
pros: Small enough to serve as a footrest
Beautiful faux-leather design looks good near sofa
Easy assembly that doesn't require tools
Thick cushion provides comfort for feet and calves
cons: Some owners complained of an initial odor that disappeared after a few days

customer_reviews.title: Really nice footstools!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these with the brown leather/fabric cover, for our motorhome. We have two chairs that aren’t recliners, but we found they each just needed an automan. These are the perfect height, 15” high and across. They have a nice covering to them and match the fabric in the RV. We were surprised that they came in a flat box. But they unfolded, the support board went in the bottom, and the heavy duty lid went on. The surprise was how sturdy they are! And yet, we could fold them back up flat for storage if we need to. Yes I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Kaye

customer_reviews.title: ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so, the chemical outgassing is pretty epic. I left mine outside on the back porch for six days and the stench was still noticeable, if no longer eyewatering. At that point, I took a spray bottle of household vinegar to it, spraying down the entire ottoman, inside and outside, and rubbing the vinegar in with a washcloth. Then I set it under a ceiling fan to dry. A short while later, no more smell. An excellent, affordable storage ottoman, especially if you plan to use it for items that don't absorb odors. If you plan to use it for storing yarn projects, throw blankets, stuffed animals, etc., you might want to take the extra steps to neutralize the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I have a nook 44inches wide and about 30 inches deep, so I bought 2 of these storage ottomans. As these are 43" wide, they fit very snugly, with just enough space for the baseboards and to be able to lift the cushions to access the storage. They're very sturdy and super easy to set up. They do stick out of the nook, but I knew they would based on the measurements, but considering the price, it's nothing short of perfect for the space I have. I will add larger cushions to sit on as they are quite hard, but overall I'm very happy with my new reading nook.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great looking! Cutting Edge
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to use at my dining table in my RV. They look fantastic and the storage is a blessing. Further update 4 months later 4 star rating was actually thought 3 star. The outside corner are sharp so be very care fully walking around them. I have cut both my leg on the edges and believe me its no picnic. Still they are beautiful. I have used them as my seats to dining area in an RV.
customer_reviews.author: RCflyboy65

customer_reviews.title: Crazy awesome ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: I think the one I got was 30 inches just be aware that there’s only one iron support bar not two This thing is awesome I’m 220 pounds and I can stand on this thing. Lots of storage and you can fold it away
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, it's quite amazing how sturdy a fold up ottoman like this can be. I've climbed it, stood on it, sat on it with my husband and it doesn't feel even a tad weak. Very nice and I was pleasantly surprised. Lots of room inside and the only annoying thing is that if you stuff it, the metal support will move and disconnect but I plan on just putting in some kind of screw to secure it permanently
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I wish I'd have found this years ago! I'm a disabled RN and first responder after having destroyed my back lifting people for so many years. Having said that, I had absolutely no problem getting this set up. It was quick and easy to do. I have it at the foot of my bed for extra clothing storage and I sit on it to put on shoes. It is very strong and I love the way it looks. I also love the way it opens from one side or the other, too! I'm extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: Terrrrriffffffic Buy For the Money
customer_reviews.text: This stool actually exceeded my expectations. When I read the description I figured I would have to put the "foot stool" together & was hesitant to order. I was greatly surprised when it arrived all folded up & all I had to do was unfold it & put the lid on & had my stool with storage space no less. It exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: C. OHara

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 6 months and it already broke.thetip part it’s in pieces and dangerous because staples are coming out. It’s poorly made. Don’t waste money buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesgo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nanny and often bring the kids back to my house so I keep a collection of toys that I was tired of having all over the place. I purchased one of these storage benches to keep the toys out of sight while also providing extra seating when needed. It looks great and fits a ton of stuff! I ended up buying a second one for my bedroom to store extra blankets. My dogs have also used it to get up on the bed which eliminated my need for ugly dog stairs so it was a win win!
customer_reviews.author: Jaci

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but very sturdy. I wasn't sure how strong it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but very sturdy. I wasn't sure how strong it would be but I feel completely comfortable sitting on it. Perfect for hidden toy storage. Perfect height for a foot rest. May order another. I will say I had to leave it open for awhile to "air out" as there was a strong smell inside.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, this 'box' is incredible. The fabric is decent and seems very durable. The design is so smart - just unfold the base and place the top on it - voila! You can pick up one side or the other to access the contents, which is easy enough for my three-year-old. to do. It's also crazy strong. It has held up to adults sitting on it and my grandson jumping on it. Overall, I am very impressed with this affordable storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They are small enough that they can be put out of the way - we are using them to store snuggle t.v. blankets. Shipping was timely, it was easy to put together and looks great! The quality is awesome too - fits perfectly into our living room design. I love the material - if something spills on it, it's easy to wipe without staining fabric of any kind. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: OllieBear21

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for a decent Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: We got what we paid for. Materials seem to be above average quality and the Ottoman is reinforced with a single steel bracket in the middle that can support up to 660lbs (according to a company rep). It makes for an excellent storage solution for blankets and the perfect sized step-stool for little dogs (~40 lbs or less).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, sturdy, and nice looking storage.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable. I sat on it and I weigh 185 lbs and seemed very solid. Literally took me 30 seconds to set up. It's just folded up and you just add the support bar and add the lid. I used this in my kids room as a seat and a storage box for toys. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Etnelson1

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product, great great great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so my 40lbs doggie could get on the bed. As per another reviewer this works perfectly! It's sturdy enough that me and my large man can sit on it together without worry. Great storage and easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One very happy  customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It’s very easy to assemble and just the right size for what I’m using them for. I got and made a coffee table out of them. I have yet to put a round piece of glass on top should anyone need to use it for drinks. I’m getting it together bit by bit and I’m loving it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Masseyfike

customer_reviews.title: cheap, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but functional. The fabric looks like plastic and there is some bubbling in my unit. A person can put their full weight on it. I had several people try it out and it would safely hold up to 200lbs, probably more. I think the price I paid is fair, if I wanted something nicer I would have paid more. The seller saw my review, and contacted me to see what they could do to make it better. I think that is very sweet, but honestly, for 20 bucks, I think it is fine. I wasn't expecting a high-end piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. H.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing took maybe 2 seconds to put together. I’m a person who appreciates quality over quantity and when I saw that this was a folding ottoman, I was a little sketched out..I received this product early, and immediately began putting it together. It’s awesome..the fabric is awesome, it truly does open the way it should, mine didn’t even have a smell! I loved it so much that I bought two of them! Super psyched!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Youmans

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: This Ottoman is perfect for storage and great for seating. We have about 20 garments stored inside the ottoman and their is room for more if needed. The Ottoman is very sturdy and can hold my 300 pound husband with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Msjonz

customer_reviews.title: If you have difficulty assembling this, please get professional therapy
customer_reviews.text: I mean, you basically unfold it similarly to shaking out a flat shopping bag into bagful form. The thing makes a great footstool, with just the right amount of cushioning and an ideal height. If you have left the unit unattended with the lid off, be sure to remove any kitties what as may have hopped into the spacious box, before replacing the lid. The unit functions well as a step-stool. The lid is easy enough to remove and replace that it should function well as an Emergency! Immediate! Hide! Stash. I hope the cushion covering is longterm durable; so far it is unmarred and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lacrocivious Acrophosist

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I bought it mostly so my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I bought it mostly so my dogs could climb up onto my bed but I really love the storage. The top is very convenient to throw things in.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen daley

customer_reviews.title: If there is a odor to your ottoman it probably will not go away.
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these storage ottomans..... Except for the odor! It is a very pungent musty smoky scent. The fact that I've had them six months shows how much I wanted them to work. I tried airing them out in the beginning. Then expecting the smell to dissipate I decided to use them. Have tried different odor products, but nothing has helped. I'm going to have to discard these... I just can't stand it anymore. I have not contacted the company, so no complaint against them. I've just waited so long I don't feel it is appropriate to expect action now. Just be advised to not procrastinate if odor is bothersome for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy but looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a lot to say about ottomans in general, this one looks nice, easy to put together and you can fit a lot in them. They are supposed to hold a significant amount of weight, but we sat on one of them (we ordered 2) and it broke the side immediately. It's still usable to store stuff, and to use to put your feet on, but I'm very disappointed that you can't even sit on it like it says you should be able to.
customer_reviews.author: Christine.

customer_reviews.title: A+ on sturdiness. Great value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: When I read the weight limit on this collapsible ottoman was 660lb, I definitely scoffed. When I "assembled" it (I use this term loosely because it's SO easy to do it. Just unfold and put the lid on), I immediately sat on it. I'm plus sized, little over 200lb, and it definitely feels sturdy. I have it on my living room, so the kids to store their mess away at the end of the day. Looks super good with the rest of the decoration, too. Can't comment on durability since I've just had it for around 2 weeks. I'll update later if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good option for camper footstool
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new travel trailer with couch and noticed at night watching DVD we needed a foot rest. Both 2 smaller ones so we each have one. Good product and easy to setup and can fold down if need space, we don't. The grandkids sit on them with ease and sturdy. Adds storage for things like games, etc. Top soft enough for bare feet and height good for viewing comfort.
customer_reviews.author: R & S Knoxville

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our boat to: provide a little extra storage space, provide additional seating, and provide foot rests. Mission accomplished! They look very nice, they are sturdy enough to hold bottles and heavy items and sturdy enough to sit on. They were simple to ‘assemble’. Bonus: we use the lids upside down on our laps as trays for our dinner plates when we eat inside. Wish they were 16”x16”x16” though as they would be a better fit for foot rests if they were just a bit taller. But all-in-all, they work great on a boat, RV, small room, etc. Glad we bought them and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. Last one I bought in November. The cover broke. It's easy to assemble, and good looking. But zero start for the sturdiness. Quality is not good. I'm not seeing picture attachment option here on Amazon. Otherwise, I've pictures of the broken one. I don't expect it to last for a long time, but not less than 5 months given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Roy

customer_reviews.title: Fits my need perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This storage ottoman was exactly what I've been looking for. I cannot find it anywhere locally, unless want neon green or pink. I'm able to fit SIX blankets in it, and it slides perfectly under an end table. I can always pull it out to use as an extra table while entertaining. I'm thinking about ordering 2 more. Nice and sturdy. While it did have a slight odor (it's leather), the smell was gone within a day, and the blankets do not smell like anything but detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tiraboschi

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This served its purpose. Used it as a toy chest. Easy set up, practical and multi-functional. However, it had a strong stanky (Yes, stanky) chemical smell for just about a year after buying, no exaggeration. Tried airing it out dozens of times but the scent was persistent. Over a year and a half later, the chemical smell has finally ceased but my kid has pretty much trashed the lid between potty training, snacking and jumping all over it.
customer_reviews.author: JulZee

customer_reviews.title: Did not stand up to 3 days use
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the first time. While they looked great and were easy to put together, just 3 days of putting our feet up for a few hours at night, and the lid already ripped. Not worth the hassle to return. Bummer because we needed them for our camping trailer. The lightweight design appealed to us. If it can’t stand up to the weight of an average man’s legs, I do not see them supporting 600 lbs. Will be replacing ASAP and spending more money for a better build.
customer_reviews.author: Medieval momma

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this " Storage Ottoman Cube Footrest Stool Coffee Table Puppy Step." They covered about everything we've used this for. If you put, say 40 pounds of cat litter in it, it really feels like a solid piece of furniture. But with or without anything inside the box is surprisingly solid and strong. I'd say that it would last a good long time unless someone's dragging it with someone on top, or pushing hard on the side near the top, while seated. Use it normally and it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: Sam North

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is nice and item looks exactly as in the photos i ...
customer_reviews.text: it's a little smaller than expected but they do provide dimensions so that was kind of on me. The fabric is nice and item looks exactly as in the photos i fit a comforter a few sets of sheets, small throw blankets and towels pretty spacious to be honest I'm satisfied with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bin
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bin. I didn't believe you can sit on it and still be sturdy but it really is. It doesn't feel like its going to break lol. The kids slime jars and other stuff fit to hide it out of view. Fit under a desk and we pull it out as needed or extra seating when their friends come over. Also purchased the ottomans that look similar and those are also sturdy and great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute storage cube doubles as ottoman. Pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little storage cube that doesn't take up a lot of space. It can also double as an ottoman. It's sturdy enough for storage, and to rest your legs.. For $18, you get exactly what you paid for. I think its a good value. However, the Item took a while to be delivered. Ordered it on 4/21, delivered on 5/5. I don't think I'll ever order from this vendor again. But, I will review the product on it's own merit; not my shipping issues.
customer_reviews.author: Swiszms

customer_reviews.title: Finally a place to hide my shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this. It is easy to assemble (just pops open), is sturdy, looks nice, and I can hide all my shoes in there and they are safe from dust. Much better use of space when you don't have space to spare and too many shoes for a show rack. I've also bought some single units which I hide other things in like socks and even use as a bench for my computer desk. We'll see how they hold up to the cat's claws but a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: catwrangler

customer_reviews.title: Great value and so versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they are great. I use the one upstairs for blanket storage and as an ottoman for an occasional chair. You can flip the lid and use it as an end table for drinks and it folds flat for quick storage when empty. I give 4 stars for "sturdiness" only because I would not use it as a "seat" for anyone much over 150-175 pounds as a safety measure. Perfect seat, however for children at the coffee table or additional seating for smaller adults. Exterior is very nice and wipes clean with a damp cloth. A great addition to any room.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie N. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this bench. I wasn't sure when we were putting it together because it seemed "too easy". But, it really does hold a lot of weight on top of it. Both ends can lift up, so I have one end and my son has the other to put our shoes in to keep them out of the way. Plus, the cats love to lay on it and it's a good springboard to their cat tree. If I needed another one, I would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great for use as a laundry hamper/sorter.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these. They are well-made and look more expensive than they are. I bought them to use together as a laundry sorter in my bedroom. It looks much nicer than any real laundry sorter that you could buy, and they double as seating! It's true that they do have a funky chemical smell for a while. I suggest keeping them outside with the lids off for a week to air them out. Then, put a fabric softener sheet inside. After a while, the smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fox

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution for me. I have a fairly small space and I didn't want to fill the living room with a big coffee table. I can slide this wherever I want and use it for my feet or my coffee. It looks great in the space, and it's a great place to store my flannel throws if I want to have a nap in my chair. And if I need to clear it away completely, I can fold it down and store it easily. The dark brown leather look goes great in the space too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Walker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best values for the money I have purchased in a long time!! It is so easy to assemble. You actually don’t even assemble it you just open it and kind of Assembles itself. It’s stores a lot of stuff, it’s sturdy and it looks very nice. I am going to purchase a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bench is not very comfortable, nor does it seem like it will hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but that is my fault for not paying attention to the dimensions. I was hoping for more storage space. I can only get a few throw blankets in before it is full. The bench is not very comfortable, nor does it seem like it will hold too much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee M

customer_reviews.title: Great for Classy Hiding Spot
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use to put piano books in so they weren't all over creation by the piano. It matches our piano bench very well and the music fits inside perfectly. Super easy to put together. I don't think I would use it to sit on (it's hallow, so not much stability there), but you could sit something non-super heavy on the top of it and it shouldn't cave in.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiS

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than I had hoped. I got a little worried when I opened the package. It looks about as durable as an ottoman made from an old cardboard box. Once you get it put together, however, it looks great and feels substantial. My cats have tried to sharpen their claws on it a few times—even with their cat tower right next to it—and I haven't been able to tell where they were scratching. The amount of storage is excellent. The color and fabric are perfect for the room it's in. I have no complaints so far and I've had it for over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra seating
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a couple of these ottomans for extra seating. They seem sturdy and good quality, and the dark brown matches our couch. They also happen to store away under our side tables perfectly! We will probably store blankets in them once the smell on the inside of the ottomans dissipates. Hoping that won’t take long...
customer_reviews.author: JRAD

customer_reviews.title: Is foldable
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice anywhere in the description that said this ottoman folds, but it does. I was looking for a one piece, solid structure and was surprised when this came in a flat box. BUT it’s awesome! The description says it supports 600 pounds and I think that’s true! I can’t believe how solid it is!
customer_reviews.author: M Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage when you need it, and a ottoman, too!
customer_reviews.text: I was told about these handy little storage ottoman's by some new friends while we were traveling in our motorhome. The leather is attractive, and they look nice with the decor. They create storage for our motorhome and provide a nice foot rest, and collapse for easy storage when not needed. They are perfect for holding wine, the cardboard case even fit inside so bottles don't clank together, perfect until we're ready to refrigerate. The cube is quite roomy and can be used for just about anything! This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marnee Alexander

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: This Chic ottoman was almost perfect. It did fulfill its purpose for me which I use for a footstool a seat and to store DVDs and games, I like that it's flat on top. The only issue I'm having with it is that this thing does not move on my carpet rug. It's just extremely hard to move around in general. Because it's only meant to be sturdy vertically it unfortunately has a lot of give when pushed or gripped from the side so picking it up or moving it can be quite a hassle, and I still haven't figured out any way to get around that
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: So nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I needed something to use as a step for my aging dog to get on the bed. I only have a very small area to place it and need it to fold to store out of the way. This looked good and was the right size and height. However, I had serious reservations about the sturdiness and quality of this stool. Based on the price I took a chance and couldn't be happier with it. It looks very nice and seems more than solid enough to accommodate a 55 pound dog jumping on and off it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Yes this does have a weird smell inside when you first buy it but it doesn't last and a couple of dryer sheets or activated charcoal packets in the bottom make quick work of it. I am surprised by how nice this works and how well it hold up for the low price it is. Would recommend and would buy again, in fact I am buying the small ones for the den.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was a little afraid at first because the box was so small, but it all fits in there perfectly and there’s really no assembly required. Just take it out of the box, unfold the storage area, and put the top on! I do t really understand how the little metal square works that goes with it but I’ll look more into that later. I bought this to go with my Delta nursery chair that’s pictured and it actually matches perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Get this cute ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ottoman! I love the color and it looks super cute in front of my bed! Its great for extra storage like books, folders, scrapbooks, shoes, toys, whatever! & It’s so easy to put together, you don’t even break a sweat...now bringing it in the house from it being delivered to your door— now you might sweat a little then lol. But no seriously, GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Dburton3

customer_reviews.title: the best investment this year
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these things are more than just practical they're multi-useful. They serve as a bench for the end of my bed and as storage for my bedroom. I must say it was an amazing touch to my bedroom space. Im over 200 pounds and the bench supported my weight with ease. THere's also good room on the bench because they're deep
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small packing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today in a very small box I was so shocked literally it's the lid in a box. I was terrified how will this hold and weight to sit on. You simply unfold it and put the insert in the bottom and add the lid. Very nice small packing, and it holds up great. Had my 330lb friend sit on it without and issues. Says it's good up to 660lbs anyhow. Very cute decent room inside for storage. First impressions are good oh and seat is comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy to "build"
customer_reviews.text: I would not say it's worth the price, if I had paid half I'd love it. The top removable lid is more the the entire bottom box itself. It fit the measurements I needed and it serves it's purpose none the less but it's got a decent top with a $20 collapsible bottom compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase!  Great for game controllers, chords and cables.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little storage Ottoman. It's made me a much happier mom of teenagers. Game controllers get stored in it now and not all over the floor. I love that it can hold the weight of being used as a chair and the top is rigid enough to set a drink on top of and not worry about it falling over. It matched my brown/oxblood couches well enough to look very nice next to them. If you have a small space, this is just the thing to use as both storage and seating.
customer_reviews.author: Scubabon

customer_reviews.title: USEFUL MEDICAL SUPPLEMENT
customer_reviews.text: Having a blood clot in my left leg required me to elevate that leg whenever possible. I determined an appropriate height by using several cushions of 2 and 3 inches which worked out to be 12" total. Your cube ottoman of one foot dimensions is perfect for that height placing a pillow on top of it for cushioning I can sit on my futon and have my leg elevated properly for hours at a time. It is simple t assemble, moves easily into place when I need it and fits my living room's décor perfectly. Good product arrived on time and set up in minutes and is used daily to elevate the leg. Thanks for the prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Camping Trailer Footrest!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for our camping trailer! We have a sofa we watch tv on - no footrest! But as you know, with a camping trailer, you are looking for ways to minimize space utilization. These fold up compactly, open and set up easily, and are just right for our use. Bought two, one for each of us. No more trying to decide if we need to pull the couch out into a bed to relax with our feet up and watch tv!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Viets

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Extemely Useful for Organization
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two to use as ottomans in our den that would also serve as a place for both of my grandchildren to store their playthings and books individually. Of course it won't store huge articles but great for their books, markers, puzzles and craft type articles to keep them separated. It even holds their gloves and such when they come in so less likely to get misplaced. I love them having a place to keep things separated and so do they. Very attractive and looks like real leather in my den. So far very durable and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: gcottrell8289

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I used to manage a fluff & fold service and one of the regular customers worked for McCormick. This had a vague spicy smell that is very similar to that guy's unwashed uniforms for maybe the first couple hours. My cat scratched the top a few times, no issues with the fabric. Got her a new scratchy thing and she leaves it alone except for naptime. Ymmv. Definitely great for storage at the end of my bed. And for SUCH A GOOD PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Great for RV
customer_reviews.text: This worked our great for us. I ordered two of them. We use them in our RV. The top opens for storage, which is always welcome in an RV. They work well as foot rests from the swivel chairs and couch. Will probably order two more as they have worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep my legs elevated whenever possible. This is the perfect solution! I can take it wherever I go, on trips, etc. It's much sturdier than I thought it would be, and the covering blends with everything. Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: megan whitby

customer_reviews.title: Another great buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Another great buy on Amazon! Brought one in Walmart and it cost 30.00 and it fell apart in 2 years. Plus it was discolored right from the start. This one is EXACTLY what I needed. No discoloring and you can tell it won't fall apart in 2 years like Walmarts did!
customer_reviews.author: Carnal C

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Stable, and Great Grey Color!
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, super soft, I have it at the foot of my bed and I sit on it occasionally to put on my shoes. I like the way it opens-up, compared to others) ottomans where you just plop the top open. I've laid on it before to take a quick nap just because the cushion is so soft (i'm about 155 lbs). Only downside is the metal piece that goes in the middle doesn't stay in place, everytime i open the ottoman it moves the metal piece. Wish that was attached in a sturdier more secure way.
customer_reviews.author: José G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep way in the back under my desk in my cubicle at work so after working 15+ hours and I got back to my desk I could put my feet up and relieve the pain in my legs and feet. I is easy to put together and feels plenty sturdy enough to store things in at home or sit on at home if I no longer need it at work. Best thing is I got the black one and when I'm not using it is so far back in the corner where I sit that no one but the janitor who has to vacuum the area even knows it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pea

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss with the quality
customer_reviews.text: The item does come with a strong smell, but will go away after a few days of being aired out. I purchased 4 of these for my classroom. Two of them are falling apart after just 4 months of use. The lids are not very sturdy. Just a few pieces of plywood and the material is just held together with a few staples. I wish I could return the tops or at least try to have them repaired. Not sure if two of the products are just not made as well as the other two because I love the ones that have held together and look like new after being used for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works great as foot stool
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this little box. It is comfortable to put my feet up on. It is sturdy enough for me to sit on. It has a small storage area for headphones, notebooks, papers, and a few books. It is portable and I can move it where I want - very lightweight. I like that I can fold it up, if needed. And, the black color matches my chair. I purchased one for my husband, also, because it is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman with nice storage.
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is perfect for the foot of my bed. It fits perfectly with my king size bed the way I hoped. It is not a large ottoman but I wanted just enough storage for pillows, sheets and blankets without taking up to much space walking by it. It is plenty sturdy to sit or stand on. Both my kids use it to climb onto my bed now. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Av

customer_reviews.title: I guess it’s the best you can get for $50
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s the best you can get for $50... they have this girl sittin on it chillin... she must weigh 10 pounds because this thing is basically cardboard. I bought it to store sheets and blankets.... it’ll work I suppose. But don’t think you’re buying a piece of furniture. Your buying a cardboard box with one metal support and a lid
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for something that would be easy to carry when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I read about these folding cubes when reading a review for an inflatable stool. I was looking for something that would be easy to carry when traveling. I need to rest my legs and ankles by extending them, and most hotel rooms are not equipped with anything that works. We have tried using luggage, ice chests, trash cans, etc. but none were exactly correct and not very comfortable. This sounded like it would be exactly what I needed. I was able to store it in a tote bag I already owned. it is "packed" and ready for my next road trip. The construction seems sound and the top appears to be soft enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G. Wills

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! I have it by my front door and use it to store extra blankets and board games. It's wonderful to be able to sit on it to put your shoes on. I want about 5 more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Danowski

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace similar ottoman that lasted for a few years but then take leather started cracking. This one looks pretty good out of the box. Assembly is super easy and takes less than a minute. It allows you to store a thin folded blanket. Comfortable to rest your feet on it when sitting in a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Storage Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: The storage ottoman is very nice. It is foldable, sturdy and provides good storage. My only complaint is the new smell has not worn off yet. Not a dealbreaker, because the ottoman is exactly what I wanted and the quality is worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great for throw blankets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these. Very attractive and easy to put together. You can fit 2-3 throw blankets depending on size and thickness. I would imagine you could also store toys in them if you want to keep them out of sight, but still have an attractive container.
customer_reviews.author: Bananarama

customer_reviews.title: Useful and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It's sturdy so you can sit on it, it's comfortable to rest your feet on it, and the storage inside is convenient to store things that you may need to use from time to time, which helps keep things tidy in your room. Plus this thing looks good, I love the color, it matches my setup pretty well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gavyne

customer_reviews.title: Good storage top is FLIMSY
customer_reviews.text: Its a great little storage cube. We use it for toys. But the top is REALLY poor quality. I’ve been looking to see if I can just get a replacement top, I’ve only had it since July and the entire top is broken and falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Better and sturdier than we expected
customer_reviews.text: This was better quality and sturdier than we expected. We are reorganizing and will be getting a couple of more of these. We have actually taken this one camping. It can hide your loo bucket or whatever you want to store in it like bedding, camp shower bag, power pack, etc. and double as a seat or side table as well. The heaviest person who's used this as a seat weighed 190lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Chief, Cook & Bottle Washer

customer_reviews.title: The top is fairly plush and very comfortable to put your feet on
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a box my son was using as a footstool. It turns out to be almost the exact same height and a little wider so that worked out well. It took all of 1 minute to pull it out of the box and set it up. The top is fairly plush and very comfortable to put your feet on. It it sturdy so no fear of collapsing, he says he even sat on it (he's almost 6 feet tall). He stores a blanket and some video game controllers in it so that turned out to be a plus. If you're looking for something simple and sturdy but good looking and well built, this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhouse

customer_reviews.title: Best Ottoman on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: The lid is surprisingly super great quality. The box itself is foldable BUT it comes with a bottom insert so it won't collapse in itself. Totally worth the money if you're looking for a cheap ottoman that's nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy foot stools with a large amount of storage. I was very sceptical about buying these because the price was so low but I am pleased to say I love them!! We ordered 2 for our new apartment and couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive, sturdy, and work well for using in my small screened in porch as footrests and extra seating for kids or adults. They don't get wet there. They don't take up much room, but are just the brown color I wanted to match the floor.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca5000

customer_reviews.title: ... star is because the same design that allows for easy 'construction' also allows for easy 'deconstruction' by my young ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have left off a star is because the same design that allows for easy 'construction' also allows for easy 'deconstruction' by my young children. The odds of this being up and holding toys or being flat under a bed somewhere is 50/50. Otherwise this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beccah

customer_reviews.title: I can recommend, with a caveat...
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad. A bit flimsy. I wouldn't sit on it much, or stand on it at all. But it's not unattractive. And was very easy to assemble. I can recommend, with the warning it's not sturdy enough to sit on unless you are still and don't move laterally much.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Looks a lot more expensive than than what I paid. I was afraid it would look super cheap. The storage is amazing. My daughter can sit or lay on top. I have sat there and it holds me with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle

customer_reviews.title: Fits so much!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I was looking for a storage solution to all the chords and electronics I have by my desk and I wanted something large but compact. This works perfectly! It's also perfect for resting your feet.
customer_reviews.author: lemonsquare7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I don't have room for a normal end table next to my recliner love seat, so I bought this. It's short enough that I can work the recliner control buttons on the side I keep the remotes, extra video game controllers and cat toys/grooming supplies inside. The top serves as a table for drinks as I watch TV. Very sturdy and easy to put together. It was inexpensive, but doesn't look cheap. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Helmet

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with the ottoman. Perfect compliment to my sofa in my RV.. When traveling it breaks down for easy storage. When I arrived it adds comfort and another storagea area.. the price is also a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench/storage box.
customer_reviews.text: Great end of a bed storage/bench. Incredibly quick and easy to put together, holds a lot of stuff, plus feels very sturdy when sitting on it ( I am 6'4", 250+ lbs). Also works great as a step for pets to jump up onto if you have a taller bed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect much when I got it. You kind of pop it up and fold it into the shape it needs to be in...but I'll tell you what, It is STURDY and a good looking little thing. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brmetalfan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected especially for the price. Completely functional. Idiot proof assembly. Cushioned enough to sit on and the fabric sides give enough so I don't whack my toe too hard when I wake up in the morning. I really like the color. I haven't had it that long so I can't give a review about durability. I can say, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover broke two weeks after I purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cover broke less than 2 weeks after I purchased. Says it holds up to 660 lbs and my son and his friends are wrestlers. Cover split at side with a 210 lb young man sitting on it. And I am unable to contact the seller to ask for a replacement cover. I was so excited about this for my son's college dorm and now am disappointed. All I want is a new cover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Prueser

customer_reviews.title: Does smell like a lot of people say - hasn't totally dissipated ...
customer_reviews.text: Does smell like a lot of people say - hasn't totally dissipated and it's been a long time now. Otherwise, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Not the sexiest ottoman but does the job! It comes flat in the package box, which is a couple inches thick. Slip in a thin square for the base and that seems to hold the cube shape of the sides as they unfold and the lid slips on. It's pretty level and works well to hold cups or what not. Quite dark in colour and not a bad finish. Not leather but to be expected at this price. Holds quite a lot of stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: @A_Random_BlokeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy to put together. Its a collapsible unit that comes with a middle solid brace and then when putting the top on it, it's pretty dang sturdy. I'm 215 lbs and can sit or step on it with no problems. Love the storage and fits right in the open space in my bedroom to a T. Looks great in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely smelly!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and use of the bench but omg.. it smells so bad!!! Anything you put inside will stink like the bench does.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a moving box with some seldom-used items in it. Now instead of an eyesore, it blends in with the rest of my furniture and looks very nice. It was super easy to assemble (just a couple of minutes) and is sturdy enough. I wouldn't stand on it, but it could handle a few books or a lamp.
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Preston

customer_reviews.title: looks great and adds a lot of hidden storage
customer_reviews.text: We got this to act as a laundry bin for our studio, it blends in perfectly and holds 3 different laundry bags inside making sorting clothes very easy. it is also very easy to put together, took about a minute to get it up, and it is very sturdy once it is up. for sitting, both the wife and I can sit on it without noticing any signs of distress in the the ottoman, so thats a plus. also, the fact that the lid can open from either side is incredibly useful. overall a solid addition to our home
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great end of the bed bench! Long enough to sit at the end of my California King size bed. Holds so many things like Blankets and extra pillow cases and things that seem to clutter on my bed. Also it's durable enough to sit on while putting on shoes for the day. Looks expensive and adds charm to my bedroom. I purchased another one for my sons room to throw all his gaming stuff inside instead of being all over the floor. Was a great purchase overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for our RV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect choice for our RV! Well made and just as described in the product's description. Folds great for storage in the limited storage one encounters with an RV. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a small ottoman. It came well packaged and delivery was great. I did not notice any smell as some have described. The instructions that came with the ottoman detail how to handle any smells should they occur.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Taller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Taller than expected & that's a good thing! Extremely light box, light product & easy set up, yet sturdy. I placed 40 journals inside easily & still have space for something else. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

product_meta.title: SONGMICS 15 x 15 x 15 Inches Folding Storage Ottoman Cube Footrest Stool Coffee Table Puppy Step, Holds Up to 660lb, Faux Leather, Black
product_meta.description:
Size:15"| Color:Black

This SONGMICS storage ottoman is finely crafted with superior faux leather & quality MDF, the after-set-up construction is sturdy & solid, decorative appearance matches your interior deocor & furniture.

It may work as

Storage Chest 
Sundries finally has somewhere to go, no matter blankets, cushions, clothes, or remotes, books... an easy solution to organize your working and living environment.

Extra Seat 
No enough stools for companies? With this wonderful combination, it takes you seconds to set up a stool.

Foot Rest 
Tired after whole days' work? Here comes a nice place to rest your feet on while sitting on couch.

Puppy Step 
Puppies may use it to step onto your bed or watch out of the window.

Coffee Table 
With ottoman tray, it becomes an ottoman coffee table to place drinks or foods.

Specifications: 
- Color: Black 
- Upholstery Material: Faux Leather 
- Seater Filling Material: High Resilience Sponge 
- Construction Material: CARB P2 Medium Density Fiber Board
- Product Size: 15"L x 15"W x 15"H (38 x 38 x 38cm) 
- Product Weight: 7.2lbs

Package Contents: 
- 1 x Folding Storage Ottoman
feature_bullets: AMPLE STORAGE SPACE: Spacious hidden storage room for sundries including clothes, blankets, children's toys or many other stuffs inside; organize your living room, bedroom and hallway
Comfortable Seat: padded with high resilient sponge, this small ottoman will bring you Superior sitting experience; soft Corners protect you and Your families from bumps
Super sturdy structure: supported by Thickened MDF boards, this Storage ottoman can hold up to 660lbs under Static State, you don't need to worry about the durability at all
Hassle-reee assembly: setup only takes seconds; It can also be folded flat, stored in a cabinet to save space when not in use, wonderful for college dorms and RV
Versatile Storage Chest: with easy-to-clean faux leather surface and the ideal size (15"x 15" x 15"), This ottoman can Also be a footrest stool or a portable Coffee Table

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,929 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Top Lid, Bottom Board, Box Body
